document_data.mainbody:
horn Lane was one of many shady alleyways that could be found in the city of Yartar in the 14 century DR.
Among the alleyways of Yartar, Thorn Lane was particularly known for being congested during the day, and even more so during the night, by coin-lasses and their gentleman callers. As a humorous colloquialism, Yartarrans referred to the area as being where people went to "improve their cultural relations."
